parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: Array of three doubles of the x, y, and z coordinates of the center of mass

parameters.name: CoordinateSystemName
parameters.description: Name of the coordinate system in which the center of mass is defined

parameters.name: Config_option
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of configuration names; valid only if Config_option = swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration

title: IMassProperty.SetOverrideCenterOfMassValue
description: Overrides the center of mass of the model currently being edited in this part or assembly document.
signature:
System.Boolean SetOverrideCenterOfMassValue( 
   System.Object
Value
,
   System.String
CoordinateSystemName
,
   System.Int32
Config_option
,
   System.Object
Config_names
)

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: Array of three doubles of the x, y, and z coordinates of the center of mass

parameters.name: CoordinateSystemName
parameters.description: Name of the coordinate system in which the center of mass is defined

parameters.name: Config_option
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of configuration names; valid only if Config_option = swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration

returns: True if the center of mass is overridden, false if not
